item.description:
In this class  you will learn a short, but powerful Qi-Gong form called Dynamic Woman Qi-Gong.

The Dynamic Woman Qi-Gong sequence  blends both upper- and lower-body movements to build stamina, overall body tone, balance and coordination.

These Qi-Gong exercises move Qi ("life force" energy or bio-electricity) and blood and activate lymph flow to keep your breasts healthy and help prevent breast cancer.

You will feel more vitality and balance in your life as you practice this Qigong.


Benefits:

-stretches the torso, back and slims the waist

-stimulates the uterine palace to prevent it from any health problems

-improves menstrual periods

-helps to support prolapsed organs and give a relief for hemorrhoids

-increases libido and brings vitality to the reproductive organs

-eases menopausal transition

-brings you inner peace and comfort

 

This form will also awaken a beautiful feminine spirit in you, and

you will feel confident, beautiful, powerful, and grounded!

 

You can easily practice the form at home.

 

When: Mondays, 7pm-8pm

Where: 100 Trade Center
North Entrance
Suite 725 
Woburn, MA 01801

Zen Muscular Therapy & Wellness

(781) 359-9300 
Contact@Zen-Therapy.com



Please  wear comfortable clothes and bring a bottle of water.
item.how_to_find_us: the studio is located behind the Trade center.
item.name: Qi-Gong for Women's Health and Vitality
